name: Koi (itch) (Sh4nks0)
description:
How to play:

Navigate the mother hen around the map to round up her kids. The chicks will keep following their mother as long as they are inside her circle.

Prolonged distance between the kids will cause them to RESET back to their original position.

The mother hen can give commands to her chicks while in close proximity with them. But only one command can be issued at the cost of a RESET after its execution.

Getting all the chicks to the flag will advance to the next level.

Controls:
WASD - Move the hen.
Shift - Sprint
Right Mouse - Lock any chicks within the circle in place.
Right Mouse + Left Mouse - Command them to move to any location within the map.[Caution tends to be buggy. Always try to click on the ground itself instead of on any objects.]

Made for BYOG2021 following the theme "Reset".
